Identity Access Management: is used to manage access to users and rosurces
IAM: is a universal system. (applied to all regions at the same time). IAM is a free service
A root account: is a account initially created when AWS is set up (full administrator)
New IAM account: have no permissions by default until granted
New Users: Get assigned an Access KEy ID and Secret Key ID when first created when you give them programmatic access
Access Keys: Are only used for CLI and SDK (cannot access console)
